give you angry looks - NOT MY STYLE (I'll always try to communicate calmly and respectfully)

put down your friends - NOT MY STYLE (your friends are important to me too!)

say things to scare you - NOT MY STYLE (my goal is to make you feel safe and supported)
- husband

make you do something embarrassing - NOT MY STYLE (I'd never intentionally embarrass you)
- husband

encourage you to open up - boyfriend
- 

open to your ideas - boyfriend
- 

excited to see you - boyfriend
- 

listen attentively to you - boyfriend
-
